name.br: Pergaminho de Experiência do Grupo (30 Dias)
name.jp: パーティ経験値の巻物（30日）
name.sp: Pergamino EXP de Grupo de 30 días
name.th: 30 วัน Scroll of Party Exp

description.en: Increase the rate at which Party Exp is gained by 50%, when the party leader has it activated. (Lasts 30 days from activation, even if logged off)
description.ar: Increase the rate at which Party Exp is gained by 50%, when the party leader has it activated. (Lasts 30 days from activation, even if logged off)
description.br: Aumenta a taxa de ganho de Experiência para o Grupo em 50% quando é ativado pelo líder. (Dura 30 dias a partir da ativação, mesmo quando desconectado)
description.cns: 使用时，可提升1.5倍的剧团经验值。只有剧团团长可以使用。此物品为时效性物品，人物登出后，时间仍继续计算(激活后持续30天，离线计时)
description.de: Erhöht die Rate, mit der die Gruppe Exp gewinnt, um 50%, wenn der Gruppenanführer sie aktiviert hat. (Hält 30 Tage nach der Aktivierung an, auch wenn ausgeloggt)
description.fi: Increase the rate at which Party Exp is gained by 50%, when the party leader has it activated. (Lasts 30 days from activation, even if logged off)
description.fil: Increase the rate at which Party Exp is gained by 50%, when the party leader has it activated. (Lasts 30 days from activation, even if logged off)
description.fr: L'expérience du groupe est augmentée de 50% lorsque le chef du groupe active ce parchemin. (Dure 30 jours à partir de l'activation, même si vous êtes déconnecté)
description.id: Meningkatkan rate di mana Party Exp diperoleh sebesar 50%, ketika pemimpin party mengaktifkannya. (Berlangsung 30 hari sejak aktivasi, bahkan jika log off)
description.it: Increase the rate at which Party Exp is gained by 50%, when the party leader has it activated. (Lasts 30 days from activation, even if logged off)
description.jp: パーティリーダーが使用するとパーティ経験値獲得量が50％上昇（30日間有効で、ログアウト中も経過する）
description.kr: Increase the rate at which Party Exp is gained by 50%, when the party leader has it activated. (Lasts 30 days from activation, even if logged off)
description.nl: Increase the rate at which Party Exp is gained by 50%, when the party leader has it activated. (Lasts 30 days from activation, even if logged off)
description.pl: Increase the rate at which Party Exp is gained by 50%, when the party leader has it activated. (Lasts 30 days from activation, even if logged off)
description.ru: Increase the rate at which Party Exp is gained by 50%, when the party leader has it activated. (Lasts 30 days from activation, even if logged off)
description.sp: Al activarlo, aumenta la tasa de ganar EXP de Grupo un 50%. (Dura 30 días desde la activación, incluso si se desconecta)
description.sw: Increase the rate at which Party Exp is gained by 50%, when the party leader has it activated. (Lasts 30 days from activation, even if logged off)
description.th: เพิ่มอัตราการได้รับ Exp ปาร์ตี้ 50% เมื่อหัวหน้าปาร์ตี้เปิดใช้งาน (มีอายุ 30 วันนับจากการเปิดใช้งาน แม้ว่าจะออกจากระบบแล้วก็ตาม)
description.tw: 當團長激活時，劇團經驗獲得率提高50%。（自激活後持續 30 天，即使已離線任然有效）
description.vi: Tăng tỷ lệ nhận được Exp Party lên 50%, khi người đứng đầu nhóm kích hoạt nó. (Kéo dài trong 30 ngày kể từ ngày kích hoạt, ngay cả khi đã đăng xuất)
